messages.content: My brother is 5 years older than me.  How old am I?

You can't tell me how old you are based on the information you provided. The only thing you told me is that your brother is 5 years older than you. That doesn't tell me how old you are, only that your brother is 5 years older than you.
If your brother is 25, then you are 20 years old. You can calculate this by subtracting 5 from your brother's age.
